did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Diary-Journal of Events, etc. on a Journey from Missouri to California 1849
did.abstract: Daily journal describing conditions and events of journey from Missouri, through New Mexico and southern Arizona, to California, April 23, 1849 to December 6, 1849. Contains references to San Xavier del Bac, Tucson, Ariz., and Apaches. Includes tables of distances from various points, and a map on 4 separate sheets. Accompanied by a typed transcript.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection

prefercite.p: Diary-Journal of Events, etc. on a Journey from Missouri to California (AZ 403). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Pioneer; participant in 1849 gold rush to California.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Daily journal describing conditions and events of journey from Missouri, through New Mexico and southern Arizona, to California, Apr. 23 to Dec. 6, 1849. Contains references to San Xavier del Bac, Tucson, Ariz., and Apaches. Includes tables of distances from various points, and a map on 4 separate sheets. Accompanied by a typed transcript.

relatedmaterial.p: This material was the basis for Missouri 49er: The Journal of William W. Hunter on the southern gold trail, edited and annotated by David P. Robrick, published by the University of New Mexico Press, 1992.

item.persname: Hunter, William W., active 1844-1852 -- Travel -- Southwest, New.
